sentences.sContent: Sometimes the best way to illustrate how to do something is by counterexample.
sentences.sContent_eng: Sometimes the best way to illustrate how to do something is by counterexample.
sentences.sCn: 有时候，说明如何做某事的最好方法是举反例。

sentences.sContent: Now noticed if that's the way we interpret his argument, harmony works no longer as a counterexample.
sentences.sContent_eng: Now noticed if that's the way we interpret his argument, harmony works no longer as a counterexample.
sentences.sCn: 注意到如果这是,我们解读他论点的方式，和声就不再一个反例了。

sentences.sContent: So if we understand the argument in terms of the second interpretation, it looks as invisible. It looks all the argument still go through, Simmias' counterexample fails.
sentences.sContent_eng: So if we understand the argument in terms of the second interpretation, it looks as invisible. It looks all the argument still go through, Simmias' counterexample fails.
sentences.sCn: 所以如果我们以第二种解释,理解这个论证，灵魂是无形的,所有的论证仍然讲得通，西米亚斯的反例无效了。

trans.tranOther: an example or fact that is inconsistent with a hypothesis and may be used in argument against it
